column2: "Oh hello, <%me>... please keep your voice low."
"I'd like to let her rest a little longer."
"I told her to go rest in her room, but she refused, insisting someone might need her for something..."
"And the minute I take my eyes off of her, this happens."
"She really hasn't changed a bit. Once she makes up her mind, nothing can stop her."
"...Sometimes I feel guilty. I wonder if my timid nature is tying her down."
"It's like she's holding back to put up with me..."
"1. You worry too much."
"2. Why not ask her directly?"
"...So that's what's on your mind, Theo."
"U-Ulc!! When did you wake up!?"
"A while ago. I figured you were hung up on something silly, sighing to yourself."
"I'm not you, and you're not me. Of course we won't operate at the same pace."
"Sure, there are things I put up with, but I'm spending my time with you because I want to. Understand?"
"Yeah, I get that much..."
"No, you don't. It's because you're so dense that I'll say it more clearly."
"I want to be with you, Theo. That's why I'm here."
"Okay? Got it? You'll be hopeless if you make a girl spell it out for you any more."
"...Y-yeah, I got it."
"Sheesh. Don't make me say some embarrassing things in front of others. ...Right, <%me>?"
"...That's probably the most I've had to put up with, to be honest."
"Huh? Ulc, you say something?"
"NOTHING! Let's go, Theo!"
